title: Restaurante Vegetariano Terra Formosa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Asian
description: Small and casual vegetarian buffet restaurant operating since early 2012. Pay by weight, at around R$26 per kilo. Run by a Chinese family, and each day's spread includes many Asian dishes like vegetable sushi rolls, stir fry noodle, tofu, and others. Free Wi-Fi.
